title: Mother's Seduction 2
overview: Jeong-hee goes to her parents' home to take care of her sick mother. And then, a young lady, Se-hee, came to Jeong-hee's house to work as a household helper for a while. Yoon-soo, Jeong-hee's son, fell in love at first sight, and her husband, Seok-jin fell asleep from Se-hee's massage. Meanwhile, Jeong-hee who came to her parents' house, met Hyeok-jin who used to like her, and says she will be leaving her home for a whileâ€¦
